Introduction

Oh Hui Yeon, or Huiyeon is a South Korean singer who was under Cube Entertainment. She made her official debut on June 10th 2021 as a member of the girl group, LIGHTSUM.

On October 25th 2022, Cube announced that LIGHTSUM would continue as a six-member group following the departure of her and Jian.

She successfully passed first-round auditions for P-Nation, JYP Entertainment, and Snowball Entertainment. She also trained as an actress under Snowball Entertainment.

During elementary school, she was a figure skater, earning two awards for her performances.

Although she is not active as an idol anymore, she is sometimes active on her socials.
